mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV202QMapper.selectLoadSttcList */
SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'0' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'평 균' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'1' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'재정·경제' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'2' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'산업·금융' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'3' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'국토·해양' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'4' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'공공기관' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'5' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'전략' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'6' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'시설안전' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'7' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'사회·복지' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'8' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'행정·안전' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'9' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'지방행정1' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'10' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'지방행정2' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'11' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'특별조사' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'12' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'국방' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'15' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'감사청구' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'16' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'공공감사' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'17' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'결산' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,'18' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'Y' AS CHART_VIEW_YN ,'적극행정' AS STTC_TIT1 ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 ,'0' AS STTC_COL6 ,'0' AS STTC_COL7 ,'0' AS STTC_COL8 ,'0' AS STTC_COL9 ,'0' AS STTC_COL10 ,'0' AS STTC_COL11 ,'0' AS STTC_COL12 ,'0' AS STTC_COL13 FROM DUAL

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.arp.dao.FAACAV202QMapper.selectSttcList */ SELECT T1.RMK ,T1.ADM_OPIN ,TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_PROD_STAD_DY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_DTM_DY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS STTC_DTM_YN ,T2.STTC_TYP_CD ,T2.STTC_CLSF_CD ,T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ,T2.STTC_DATA_SNO ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_TIT2 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,T2.STTC_COL4 ,T2.STTC_COL5 ,T2.STTC_COL6 ,T2.STTC_COL7 ,T2.STTC_COL8 ,T2.STTC_COL9 ,T2.STTC_COL10 ,T2.STTC_COL11 ,T2.STTC_COL12 ,T2.STTC_COL13 ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 5 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 4 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHART_VIEW_YN ,T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,NVL(TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_DTM_DY,'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD'),'미확정') AS STTC_DTM_DY FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '202' AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = #{sttcTypSeq} ORDER BY STTC_DATA_SNO
mapper.insert:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV202QMapper.insertMaster */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200M ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_YR ,STTC_STR_MON ,STTC_END_MON ,STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,STTC_DTM_DY ,RMK ,ADM_OPIN ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '20' ,'202' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '202' ) ,SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 0, 4) ,'01' ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1)), 'MM') ,#{proStadDt} ,'' ,#{rmk} ,#{admOpin} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV202QMapper.insertDetail */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200D ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_DATA_SNO ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_TIT2 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,STTC_COL4 ,STTC_COL5 ,STTC_COL6 ,STTC_COL7 ,STTC_COL8 ,STTC_COL9 ,STTC_COL10 ,STTC_COL11 ,STTC_COL12 ,STTC_COL13 ,AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '20' ,'202' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '202' ) ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_DATA_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200D WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '202' AND STTC_TYP_SEQ = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '202' )) ,#{sttcTit1} ,#{sttcTit2} ,#{sttcCol1} ,#{sttcCol2} ,#{sttcCol3} ,#{sttcCol4} ,#{sttcCol5} ,#{sttcCol6} ,NVL(#{sttcCol7},0) ,#{sttcCol8} ,#{sttcCol9} ,#{sttcCol10} ,#{sttcCol11} ,#{sttcCol12} ,#{sttcCol13} ,#{audYr} ,#{rowKndCd} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )
